person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The official from the U.N. refugee agency UNHCR said a chartered plane had picked up the staff from Bangui and was heading for Abidjan , Ivory Coast .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| U.N. refugee agency UNHCR |
| staff |
| Bangui |
| Abidjan |
| Ivory Coast |

Note: In this paragraph, "U.N. refugee agency UNHCR" is considered a single entity, as it refers to a specific organization. "staff" is also considered a single entity, as it refers to a group of people who work for the UNHCR. "Bangui" and "Abidjan" are not entities in this context, as they are cities and not specific individuals or organizations. "Ivory Coast" is also not an entity, as it is a country and not a specific individual or organization.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to a person:

| Person |
| --- |
| staff |

The word "staff" in the paragraph refers to a group of people who work for the UNHCR, and can be considered a single entity.
